title: MODERN HTML & CSS FROM THE BEGINNING
info: Build modern responsive websites & UIs with HTML5, CSS3 & Sass! Learn Flex & CSS Grid
review: Amazing course!!!. It was amazing experience to learn HTML & CSS under Brad cooper teaching. In 2-3 points you have to search some stuff at another places also so that you can have better understating.

learn.1: Build Multiple High Quality Website & UI Projects
learn.4: CSS Variables, Transitions, Dropdowns, Overlays & More

title: MODERN JS FROM THE BEGINNING
info: Learn and build projects with pure JavaScript (No frameworks or libraries)
review: Great content, for pro and all beginners. This is another example of why Brad is so successful as teacher. Do not waste your time looking at other tutorials.

learn.1: Modular learning sections & 10 real world projects with pure JavaScript
learn.2: Master the DOM (document object model) WITHOUT jQuery
learn.4: Regular expressions, error handling, localStorage & more

title: NODE.JS API MASTERCLASS
info: Node.js API Masterclass With Express & MongoDB
review: This is a project based course where we build an extensive, in-depth backend API for DevCamper, a bootcamp directory app. We will start from scratch and end up with a professional deployed API with documentation.

learn.1: Real World Backend RESTful API For Bootcamp Directory App
learn.4: API Security (NoSQL injection, XSS protection, Rate Limiting)

title: REACT FRONT TO BACK
info: Learn Modern React 16.8+ Including Hooks, Context API, Full Stack MERN & Redux By Building Real Life Projects
review: This is a good course with beginner friendly projects. The only problem that I had was that sometimes small details were overlooked, which doesn't get in the way of learning very much.

learn.1: Learn Modern React By Building 3 Projects
learn.2: Suitable For Both Beginners & Intermediate React Developers
learn.4: Full Stack Development with MERN (MongoDB, Express, React, Node)

title: BOOTSTRAP FROM SCRATCH
info: Master Bootstrap 5 and build 5 real world themes while learning HTML5 semantics & CSS3
review: f I could give this course AND instructor 20 stars I would! This course is thorough in explaining the elements of bootstrap.I love that before you start coding projects he walks you through EACH bootstrap feature

learn.1: Learn and create amazing high quality Bootstrap 4 themes and UIs
learn.2: Learn semantic HTML5 & modern CSS3 techniques
learn.3: Learn to compile Sass in the easiest way possible using a GUI
learn.4: earn the Bootstrap 4 utilities, classes, components & JS widgets

title: MERNSTACK FRONT TO BACK
info: Build and deploy a social network with Node.js, Express, React, Redux & MongoDB.
review: This is a great course and Brat is a great professor. He explains very well every feature that he implements in the project and what you learn you can apply in real projects, because this is 100% like a real project.

learn.1: Integrate React with an Express backend in an elegant way
learn.2: Create an extensive backend API with Express

title: FULL STACK WEB DEVELOPMENT
info: Learn full stack web development with HTML5, CSS , Bootstrap 4, Javascript, ES6, VueJs, Node.Js, PostgreSQL & More
review: very practical and hands on. Although some things could be explained in a bit more depth, the breadth of this course requires a quick pace. The final project does a good job of blending most of the technologies together for a good review.

learn.1: Create A Fully Responsive News Portal Using Bootstrap
learn.2: Build A Simple Interest Calculator Using JavaScript
learn.3: Build Your Own Portfolio Site Using HTML & CSS
learn.4: Learn PostgreSQL Database From Scratch To Store Web Application Data
